about_the_game:
The final episode of the series. While Ep. 1 and 2 contained an introduction and rising action, this final installment has the highest point of tension in the storyline, where the MC faces the truth and makes an important choice (building a harem around his landlady, her daughters, and female neighbors).

Expect to:

  • Gradually seduce your landlady and her daughters
  • Breed the neighbour MILFs
  • Seduce the mom of your enemy and his gf and many other

More details will be added as the development progresses.


  • Immersive atmosphere
  • Lively backgrounds and characters (aniamted, blinking etc.)
  • Classically animated adult scenes with life imitating realism
  • Cutscenes and fully animated adult scenes

Animations sample

Seducing the landlady disguised as a priest


Getting revenge on Enemy #1



Milfvania tells the story of a young guy who got into trouble because of a girl (Julie) recruited for an amateur porn video. As a result, his father tells him it's better to move abroad. he had to move abroad, somewhere in post-Soviet Europe. There he met his landlady (Lidia) and her two daughters. But soon after, Julie follows him, and all the wicked and devilish things she does will turn out for the best.

Episodes can be played in any order, as they each encapsulate fantasies on their own.

The milfs

The girls your age

The enemies




  • netori: the protagonist (MC) takes away someone else's love interest
    ]*]corruption
  • anal sex
  • harem
  • pregnancy
  • sex in front of others
  • cheating



  • Q:Why episodes? A: It wasn't meant to be that long and my art style / animation evolved through years.
  • Q:Will Ep. 1 & 2 get revamped with the new style? A: Yes, they will be updated to match the style of Ep. 3. And more content will be added to those.
  • Q:Is Ep. 3 longer than 1 & 2? A: Yes, way longer. I took notice of your complaints and I will deliver all the story inside Ep. 3.
  • Q:Any new mechanics? A: Yes, I'm currently developing a technique to make the animated scenes more interactive and easier to switch between.
  • Q:Any news in terms of animations? A: Yes, I plan to make the scenes fully animated.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is meant for adult audiences who can distinguish between facts and fiction. The characters depicted in this game are 18 and older, all sexual depictions are consensual.

It's an overall humorous story, but with strong adult themes no shy of: corruption, lies, drug & alcohol use, physical violence. It features extended explicit depictions of sexual acts between consenting adults, but in fringe situations such as in front of others, in forbidden places etc.

It contains symbols (setting, furniture) and garments that might indicate certain religious beliefes, but they are not explicitly mentioned neither central to the story.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Milfvania Ep. 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Encompass the whole story in this largest and final episode. Graduate from the so-called "KGB University" by building your harem. Don't mind the atmospheric, decaying background. The girls will make up for it!
